description:
Blazing fresh tracks through powder is better when you can see where you’re going. Outfitted with a low-profile frame and large cylindrical lens, the Blazer goggles give you a great view of the backcountry or your favourite resort.

  • Designed for medium faces
  • Airflow lens ventilation combined with a Fog-X anti-fog inner lens, helps keep your vision clear
  • Utilizes Smith’s Responsive Fit™ design, making the frame very flexible without losing strength, allowing the frame to adjust to contours of a variety of face shapes all while reducing weight
  • 2-layer DriWix foam provides a comfortable, breathable seal
  • Wide, silicone backed strap has a quick-fit adjustment system
  • Includes a microfiber goggle bag
name: Smith Blazer Goggles - Unisex
